L

lastCharFrame - Variable in class Game
This stores the previous frame of the avatar's walking animation.
lastFinalDevFrame - Variable in class Game
This stores the final frame of the devices moving across the screen.
lastFrame() - Method in class AnimatedImage
The lastFrame() method, which returns the last frame of an animation.
Learn - Class in <Unnamed>
The Learn class This class represents the Window that has all the graphics and the mechanics for the first room of the Waterworks program.
Learn(Stage) - Constructor for class Learn
This is the class constructor.
level - Variable in class Game
The current level selected.
level - Variable in class Water
The Game level currently being played, used to calculate the score.
LevelSelect - Class in <Unnamed>
The LevelSelect class This class represents the LevelSelect window where the user will choose which level they want to play.
LevelSelect(Stage) - Constructor for class LevelSelect
This is the class constructor.
LogLine - Class in <Unnamed>
The LogLine class This class stores an object that represents the logs that the avatar will have to run across during the game.
LogLine(String) - Constructor for class LogLine
This is the constructor for this class.
logTouched - Variable in class Game
This stores whether the avatar is touching a log.
loop() - Method in class Sound
This method loops the sound.
lose() - Method in class Game
This method displays the result of the level if the user loses.
lost - Variable in class Quiz
This stores whether a device has been released above a spot that is not a box.
